messages.title: Four steps to a fairer society
messages.content: People across Britain who are fed up with old fashioned politics are turning to the LibDems for real change. It's clear the Tories won't change a thing. Their top tax priority is to cut taxes for the rich

messages.title: MICHELE
messages.content: Michele is a 42 year old mother of two, she has worked her way up in life. Not your typical politician like so many others standing. Saw problems in her community - got elected to do something about it. Will make a difference to your lives, put people before politics. Wants to be your first woman MP.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: 'If elected I will fight hard to make sure our community has a clear and distinctive voice in Westminster' - Michele

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting taxes on the first £10,000 you earn will pay no tax on that amount.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child: get class sizes down and invest in schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The party aims to reduce class sizes and invest more in education.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal change politicians! Make politicians accountable and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are advocating for political reform to increase the accountability of MPs and providing the public with the means to remove corrupt officials.

housing.content: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Michele is a 42 year old mother of two, she has worked her way up in life. Not your typical politician like so many others standing. Saw problems in her community - got elected to do something about it. Will make a difference to your lives, put people before politics. Wants to be your first woman MP.

images.caption: Michele at the Women Making A Difference Conference in Cardiff earlier this year.
